price: 他说：“我的主啊！求你秉公判决。我们的主是至仁的主，对于你们所用以描述他的言语他是被求助的。”
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
